@usedefaults

{{breadcrumb:
    - Repositories : /ays81/Repos
    - Repo $$reponame: /ays81/Repo?reponame=$$reponame
}}
{% if error is defined %}
Error : ${error}
{% else %}
{{aysrepo reponame:$$reponame}}
{{timestamp}}
@block
@row
h2. Repository: [$$reponame|/ays81/Repo?reponame=$$reponame]

h4. Actions
{{actions:
- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/executeBlueprints
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame

- display: Run
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/createRun
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame

}}

@col 6
h2. Links:
* [ActorTemplates|ays81/ActorTemplates?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Services|ays81/Services?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Blueprints|ays81/Blueprints?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Explorer|ays81/Explorer?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Simulator|ays81/Repo/simulate?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Runs|ays81/Runs?reponame=$$reponame]
* [Actors|ays81/Actors?reponame=$$reponame]
@colend

@col 6
{{form:
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/quickBlueprint
  display: 'Apply'
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: name
    label: Blueprint Name (leave empty to immediately archive)
    type: text
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$reponame
  - name: contents
    label: Add content of blueprint
    type: textarea
}}
@colend
{% endif %}
